.. _`15_2_1_changes`:

What's New in cs.actions 15.2.1?
################################


New plugin for CONTACT Tasks 15.3.0
===================================

cs.action 15.2.1 contains a new plugin for the new release 15.3.0 of CONTACT Tasks (cs.taskmanager).
For details please read the release notes of cs.taskmanager 15.3.0.
